name: 林震
objective: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
schedule:
週次     單元
1	Introduction-Concept of Stress
2,3	Stress and Strain-Axial Loading
4,5	Torsion
6	Shear and Bending Moment Diagrams
7,8	Pure Bending
9	Midterm Exam.
10	Analysis and Design of Beams for Bending
11,12	Shearing Stresses in Beams
13 	Transformations of Stress and Strain
14	Principal stresses and Max. Shearing
15	Stresses under combined loadings
16	Deflection of Beams
17	Deflection of Beams, Columns
18	Final
scorePolicy: 作業與隨堂測驗佔30%，期中考佔30%，期末考佔40%
materials:
教科書及參考書目
Beer & Johnston著〝"Mechanics of Materials〞 5th Edition
